spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly faithful. Minor inaccuracies in door wing direction for some interior rooms. Wall alignment is consistent with the 2D source.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. All rooms accounted for. No measurement lines or text present. Model is floating correctly on a dark neutral background. Deduction for slight wall thickness inconsistencies in the balcony area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the blueprint almost perfectly, including kitchen counter orientation and bedroom layouts. Block style is appropriately used.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong isometric perspective and low-poly aesthetic. Deduction for slightly warm 'glow' lighting in some interior pockets which deviates from a purely flat-shaded, ambient-only instruction.

detected_errors.description: Internal door swing directions in the top right bathroom and bedroom do not perfectly match the 2D plan.
Warm interior lighting effects suggest light sources inside rooms, slightly violating the flat-shading requirement.
